document_data.name: Plaza of the Ancients
document_data.mainbody: The '''Plaza of the Ancients''' was an open courtyard found in [[Muluk]], the City of Kings, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This public square featured two extraordinary monuments honoring two of Muluk's greatest historical rulersâ€”[[Amakim ibn Issad]] and [[Aswar al-Mutiq]].
document_data.Activities: Many pilgrims traveling from Muluk to [[Huzuz]] would begin their arduous journey from the Plaza of the Ancients.
